p: Protopanaxadiol (PPD), characterizing a group of ginsenosides, is found in ginseng ( Panax ginseng) and notoginseng ( Panax pseudo ginseng). Bak et al. demonstrated the neuroprotective effects of 20(S)-PPD (10 ÂµM) against excitotoxicity induced by glutamate (5 mM) in PC12 cells. PPD has been shown to prevent glutamate-induced apoptosis via improvement of mitochondrial function and anti-oxidant activity ( 102).
